name: UN Funds? Not So Much
title: Minimal UNDP Financial Support
description: In 2016, Nicaragua received one of the lowest net official flows from UNDP, amounting to -$29,206.86. This indicates limited financial support from this UN agency.

name: Regional Trade Champions
title: High Dependency on Regional Imports
description: In 2023, 50.79% of Nicaragua's total merchandise imports came from low- and middle-income economies in Latin America and the Caribbean, highlighting strong regional trade ties.
